NEW YORK  Trailing by three runs in the ninth inning against the best team in baseball, the Cincinnati Reds' rally started with the improbable and ended with the unbelievable.

articles.title: Pistons, without Jaden Ivey, fall to Pacers in Summer League - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: The Detroit Pistons rested Jaden Ivey and Saben Lee (ankle injuries), Isaiah Stewart and Isaiah Livers during the 101-87 defeat, their first in Vegas.
articles.content:
